Name: [General] Full Infantry Armaments
Desc: <color=#2BAD00>Significantly increases</color> Anomaly Buildup Rate, and when any squad member inflicts the <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect on enemies, restores <color=#2BAD00>50</color> Energy for all squad members. (Appears only in Rally Commissions)
Desc2: An advanced supply box left behind by the Defense Force. Inside, there's a variety of supplies for all sorts of combat situations. For a soldier operating in the Hollow, finding one of these is even better than winning the lottery.
